name: bismuth
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(symbol Bi) a chemical element that is a silver metal, used in some medicines and make-up: Bismuth adds silkiness and shine to cosmetics.
More examplesFewer examplesMines in the area have produced vast quantities of gold, silver, lead, zinc, copper, bismuth, and manganese.The bullets are now being manufactured with a bismuth alloy.None of the patients had been treated with bismuth preparations.
